  • Data Structures 1: Union-Find

    Over Summer 2024, I participated in a seminar led by Jenweil Yang that was focused on applied data structures. Near the end, he asked that participants present on a data structure of interest to them, and suggested I present on the Union-Find. You can find my slides here.
